title: Deciding a future
creator_credit: Edward King, William Hetzer and UNICEF
brief_description: UNICEF believes that a well organized and involved community that mobilizes itself for a change is performing a needed activity. This program shows how community participation has become an active means of development in Lima, Bangkok and New York.
